Literature.Title: Delineating the Mechanism of Action of a Protease Resistant and Salt Tolerant Synthetic Antimicrobial Peptide against Pseudomonas aeruginosa.
Literature.Author: Pandit G, Sarkar T, S R V, Debnath S, Satpati P, Chatterjee S

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Pseudomonas aeruginosa MTCC 2488(MIC=20µM),Klebsiella pneumoniae MTCC 443(MIC=200µM),Staphylococcus aureus MTCC 96(MIC=60µM)
